entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
